nodes.text: The V-53 Hydromancer was a multi-sailed civilian pleasure yacht that measured 23 meters in length. Consisting of both above decks and below decks areas, the yacht was designed to be crewed by six beings, although it could be manned by three if needed. Room was allocated for two passengers, and there was storage for 1 metric ton of cargo. The V-53 could reach speeds of 70 Kilometers an hour.

Multi-millionaire playboy Seth Cambriel owned a V-53 Hydromancer, the Cambus Gale, on the planet Spira which he had converted into a racing yacht by reshaping the hull, rerigging the sails and upgrading its capabilities.
